name: Triceratom Builds a Mech
description:
Tis the season. Triceratom is ready to experience life through the glass windshield of a sick mech suit.

This game was made as part of Secret Santa Jam 2021. My giftee let me (his Santa!) know that he liked robots and dinosaurs, so here's some robots and dinosaurs!

In his efforts to complete his latest creation, Triceratom has found himself a few pieces short of completion. Help our little buddy finish his badass robot suit by collecting the necessary parts from the other dinosaurs around the village. Only then can Triceratom fulfill his dream of pew-pewing his friends and neighbors as a giant robot.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Mouse - Move Camera

E - Interact

Left Mouse - Shoot (only in mech)

Esc - Pause Menu

CREDITS

Dinos/Mech Models - Me

Environment Models - PolyPerfect's Low Poly Ultimate Pack

Music - Monkey Warhol (Song: Magnum)
